actions.committee: Senate Committee on Rules and Administration
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Rules and Administration.
Reported to Senate from the Committee on Rules and Administration, S. Rept. 93-668.

official_title: Resolved, that Section 3 of Senate Resolution 50, Ninety-third Congress, agreed to February 22, 1973, be amended by striking out 255,000 and inserting in lieu thereof $275,000.

summary.text: Increases to $275,000 (now $255,000) the expenditures authorized for the Senate Select Committees on Nutrition and Human Needs to carry out its study pursuant to S. Res. 50, 93rd Congress pertaining to the lack of food, medical assistance, and other related necessities of life and health.

titles.title: Resolved, that Section 3 of Senate Resolution 50, Ninety-third Congress, agreed to February 22, 1973, be amended by striking out 255,000 and inserting in lieu thereof $275,000.
